1.0.name: wordpress/poetry
1.0.description: Through a Widget or a simple function call this plugin will show random poems from a list of 50 poets in your sidebar, obtained from mypoeticside.com. You can choose which poets to display while using the widget option, being in total over 6500 possible poems.
